sources.title: Curley (1947) HAL ROACH COMEDY
sources.description:
Exclusive MOVE CLASS by PizaFLIX Edition!
Stars: Larry Olsen, Eilene Janssen, Peter Miles
Director: Bernard Carr
In the spirit of the "Our Gang" series comes this comedy by Producer Hal Roach. Child actor Larry Olsen plays the title character, along with a cast of troublesome tikes. At school they have a new teacher -- played by Pin-Up model Frances Rafferty -- and mischievous classmates try their best to drive her mad!

CHAPTERS
0:00        PizzaFLIX Introduction
2:47        Feature Film
55:46     Please Subscribe. Thanks!

sources.title: Curley (1947) Adventure, Comedy, Color Family Film
sources.description:
A mischievous kid and his friends torment their school teachers.

Director: Bernard Carr
Writers: Dorothy Davenport, Robert F. McGowan
Stars: Larry Olsen, Frances Rafferty, Eilene Janssen
Genres: Classics, Adventure, Comedy, Family

@CultCinemaClassics:
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics 
https://www.instagram.com/cultcinemaclassics 
https://www.twitch.tv/cultcinemaclassics

metadata.Plot: Hal Roach, who no longer owned the rights to his "Our Gang" (aka The Little Rascals") creation, decided to "create" a similar gang of kids, to be known as "Curley and his Gang", and star them in feature-length films shot in Cinecolor. This film is the first effort, and is virtually a remake, with longer running time, of the 1930 "Our Gang" short, "Teacher's Pet." The kids are fretting because their favorite teacher has gotten married and departed town, and they fear her replacement will be not to their liking. When Curley mistakes the aunt of the new replacement as being the new teacher, he and the rest of the kids make plans to discourage her staying. Mortification sets in when the new teacher turns out to be sweet, young and pretty. Jackie Cooper and June Marlowe had the smitten kid/teacher roles in the original. Robert F. McGowan, who directed and wrote the original short, gets story credit here, and was also the Associate Producer.
metadata.Writer: Dorothy Davenport, Robert F. McGowan, Mary Eunice McCarthy
metadata.Actors: Larry Olsen, Frances Rafferty, Eilene Janssen
